tool_description: Chain API makes it easy to build Bitcoin applications that are fast, reliable, and secure.It doesn't need  setup, no credit card required. Quickly retrieve wallet balances, send transactions & more.
name: Chain
title: Chain

api_list.name: Block hash
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin/blocks/{hash}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Bit coin transaction

api_list.name: List Webhooks
api_list.description: List all of the Webhooks associated with a Chain API KEY.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Multiple address transaction
api_list.description: Returns a set of transactions for more Bitcoin addresses.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of transactions to return, starting with most recent.

api_list.name: List Webhook Events
api_list.description: Lists all Webhook Events associated with a Webhook.

optional_parameters.name: webhook_id
optional_parameters.description: The unique id of the associated Webhook.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com/webhooks/{webhook_id}/events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: unspent output single address
api_list.description: Returns a collection of unspent outputs for a Bitcoin address. These outputs can be used as inputs for a new transaction.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin/addresses/{address}/unspents"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest block

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: OP_RETURN
api_list.description: Returns any OP_RETURN values sent and received by a Bitcoin Address.

api_list.name: Single address transaction
api_list.description: Returns a set of transactions for one  Bitcoin address.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of transactions to return, starting with most recent.

api_list.name: Transaction OP_Return
api_list.description: Returns the OP_RETURN value and associated addresses for any transaction containing an OP_RETURN script.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin/transactions/{hash}/op-return"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-chain-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
